live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
We are working alongside BC Hydro to restore services as soon as Hydro is returned to the area.
27251.title: Oct 13 - Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island | All Services - Outages (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27282.summary: Some customers in Montgomery area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27282.title: Oct 14 – Calgary (Montgomery) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
